title: Ziff Davis Appoints Layth Taki as Chief Accounting Officer
dc:creator: Jeremy Jones
description:
"Layth is an accomplished financial executive with significant media industry and accounting expertise," said Bret Richter, Chief Financial Officer of Ziff Davis. "His wealth of relevant experience fits extremely well with Ziff Davis’ long-term growth plans."

The post Ziff Davis Appoints Layth Taki as Chief Accounting Officer appeared first on Ziff Davis.
content:encoded:
